thread.title: Richard Jefferson dunked on Terry Rozier so he got a basketball to the back
thread.title_full: Richard Jefferson dunked on Terry Rozier so he got a basketball to the back

author: Whitney Medworth
title: Richard Jefferson dunked on Terry Rozier so he got a basketball to the back
text:
Richard Jefferson making the young kids angry.
Richard Jefferson refuses to do two things. Those two things are get old and stop dunking. 36-year-old Richard Jefferson dunked on 22-year-old Terry Rozier and Rozier was not happy. The extra hang and a swing is probably what put him over the edge.
Rozier absolutely got a technical foul for this. The moral of the story is don’t get dunked on by Richard Jefferson and you’ll be fine. And if you do, don’t throw the ball at him like a child on a playground.
